英文法規名稱: Examination Regulations on the Establishment Application and License Renewal of Satellite Broadcasting Businesses and Foreign Satellite Broadcasting Businesses
中文法規名稱: 衛星廣播電視事業及境外衛星廣播電視事業申設換照審查辦法

法規內容.條文內容: These Regulations are hereby enacted pursuant to Paragraph 4, Article 6, Paragraph 3, Article 18, and Paragraph 4, Article 20 of the Satellite Broadcasting Act (hereinafter referred to as the Act).

Those satellite broadcasting businesses and foreign satellite broadcasting businesses that have submitted the application for establishment application and license renewal before January 8, 2016, according to law shall submit the required documents to the establishment application and license renewal advisory meetings of satellite broadcasting businesses, which has been established according to the Act in order to conduct a review of the application in accordance with the items set in the previous article.

For the review of the application stated in the previous article to succeed, over half of the advisory meeting members shall be present with the consent of at least two-thirds of all the members who are present.
Applications that have completed the review in the previous paragraph shall be then forwarded to the Commission Committee Meeting for review.
The composition of the establishment application and license renewal advisory meetings of satellite broadcasting businesses shall be in accordance with Paragraphs 2 and 3, Article 20 of the Act.

Those satellite broadcasting businesses and foreign satellite broadcasting businesses permitted through the resolution of the Commission shall fulfill the operation plan and various obligations set by the Act.
These Regulations shall take effect from March 21, 2016.
